author: Pavan Kulkarni

review: This is a great device.  Use it to watch on your tv anything you can bring up on the google chrome web browser.  Use it to watch you tube and vevo and netflix and hbo and a variety of other things.  Control it from your phone or tablet or computer.  A great way to modernize your (or your smart phone literate parents) tv.  Also good for making your semi-smart tv a fully smart tv.Easy to use, easy to set up, just plug into your tv's hdmi port (also has to be plugged into a power source with the ac adapter unless your tv has a power providing hdmi port which most lack).Great for travel too.  Just plug it in and show movies to your friends and boring relatives.  Use at hotels.  Fun for amazing folks who have no understanding of technology.  ("But where's the movie coming from?")The one flaw, which I think google will fix eventually, is that you can accidentally (or purposely) log on to other chrome casts.  So if you have several of them in your house you can change other people's movies while they're watching.  (Was I ever annoyed when my roommate turned off the game of thrones season finale) You can also do the same to your neighbors.  But google is smart and the google cast gets operating system updates.
